title: Charities in the United Kingdom
text:
Whilst some UK charities are incorporated as companies with charitable status, others are Charitable Incorporated Organisations (CIOs) or unincorporated charities and trusts.

There are also organisations who are recognised as charitable organisations by HM Revenue and Customs (the tax authority) but who are not registered with the Charity Commission, as the are exempt or small charities (with income below a £5,000 threshold). These organisations may have charity numbers beginning with 'X'.

No public list of these organisations is currently available.

prefix.name: Single Business Register/ Al Registro Único Empresarial

title: Colombia Business Registration
text: See http://www.doingbusiness.org/data/exploreeconomies/colombia/starting-a-business/ for information on business registration in Colombia.

prefix.name: NUTS - European Union Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics

title: Codes for Greece and United Kingdom
text:
The EU use the code 'UK' to refer to the 'United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland', where the ISO country code list uses GB. 

The EU use EL to refer to Greece (based on it's official name of tje 'Hellenic Republic') where the ISO country code list uses GR.
